story_99_00200/2401_1001_0100_10:
Bravo! You and your Pokémon have truly pushed
yourselves to be the best that you can be!
story_99_00200/2401_1001_0200_10: I think it’s time to give you this. You’ve earned it!
story_99_00200/2401_1001_0300_10:
With this gear, your team will be able to grow
even stronger!
story_99_00200/2401_1001_0400_10:
Ah, subarashii! Don’t forget, you can find more
amazing gear like this out in the field!
Now, off you go! Enjoy your next adventure!
